CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 10, 1963, pg. 6, reads: " THE STOTTS FAMILY - When Mr. and Mrs. Raymond Stotts celebrated their 40th wedding anniversary last Friday night at Loendi Club, the event turned into a double celebration because their son, Frank, celebrated his birthday on the same date. All but one of the Stottses' children were on hand for the occasion.  The honorees, seated in center are flanked by their daughters (seated, left to right) Gertrude Stotts Comer, Lydia Stotts and Mary Stotts Ritter.  Standing: Marie Stotts Francis, Joseph, Frank, and John Stotts, and Nellie Stotts Barron.  Ray Stotts Jr., in the Army, was the only member of the family not present. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Stotts family, front row from left: Marie Stotts, Raymond and Gertrude Stotts; second row: Betsy Stotts, Gertrude Stotts, Nellie Stotts Barron, Mary Ann Stotts Ritter; back row: Joe Stotts, Diane Stotts, John Stotts, Dorothy Stotts, Pauline Stotts, Frank Stotts, and George Barron, celebrating Raymond and Gertrude Stotts' wedding anniversary, in Loendi Club
